attributes.action: Ensure Covid19 regulations, are applied equally to all citizens
attributes.additional_details: Covid19  rules are not being adhered to by those who instigated them.
attributes.background: Ensure that instructions given to the public regarding Covid19 are applied to all U.K. citizens irrespective of any office an individual may hold

departments.name: Department of Health and Social Care

rejection.details:
Decisions on whether to arrest and prosecute alleged offenders is a matter for local police forces and the Crown Prosecution Service, not the UK Government or Parliament.

We have published the following related petition, which you might like to sign:

Public Inquiry into consistent enforcement of lockdown rules: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/322360
